SWIFT
  • API Reference
  • src.config.config
  • View page source

src.config.config

src.config.config.CURRENT_SEASON = 2023

int: Current NFL season. Used to fetch current season of play-by-play data.

src.config.config.CURRENT_WEEK = 18

int: Current NFL week. Used to fetch current week of play-by-play data.

src.config.config.CV_TEST_SIZE = 3

int: Number of consecutive seasons to use for testing in grouped time-series cross validation.

src.config.config.CV_TRAIN_SIZE = 7

int: Number of consecutive seasons to use for training in grouped time-series cross validation.

src.config.config.DEFAULT_PARAM_PREFIX = 'calibratedclassifiercv__estimator__'

str: Prefix for default hyperparameters.

src.config.config.EARLY_STOP_N = 10

int: Number of iterations without improvement to stop hyperparameter tuning.

src.config.config.FEATURE_PRECISIONS = {'away_lon_delta': 2, 'away_travel_distance': 0}

dict: Number of decimal places to round features to.

src.config.config.LOOKBACK_WINDOW = 3

int: Number of weeks to look back for features that only consider recent performance.

src.config.config.MAX_EVALS = 100

int: Maximum number of hyperparameter tuning iterations.

src.config.config.PASSING_AGGS = {'complete_pass': 'mean', 'fumble': 'mean', 'interception': 'mean', 'pass': 'sum', 'sack': 'mean', 'week': ['max'], 'yards_gained': 'mean'}

dict: Functions for aggregating passing features from play-by-play data.

src.config.config.PATHS = {'city_coordinates': PosixPath('/home/w3rkman/backup.varnsen/projects/nfl-analysis/data/ancillary/city-coordinates.csv'), 'features': PosixPath('/home/w3rkman/backup.varnsen/projects/nfl-analysis/data/features'), 'features_src': PosixPath('/home/w3rkman/backup.varnsen/projects/nfl-analysis/src/data/features'), 'prediction': PosixPath('/home/w3rkman/backup.varnsen/projects/nfl-analysis/data/prediction'), 'raw_games': PosixPath('/home/w3rkman/backup.varnsen/projects/nfl-analysis/data/raw/games.csv'), 'raw_plays': PosixPath('/home/w3rkman/backup.varnsen/projects/nfl-analysis/data/raw/plays'), 'results': PosixPath('/home/w3rkman/backup.varnsen/projects/nfl-analysis/data/results'), 'test': PosixPath('/home/w3rkman/backup.varnsen/projects/nfl-analysis/data/test'), 'train': PosixPath('/home/w3rkman/backup.varnsen/projects/nfl-analysis/data/train')}

dict: Paths to data files and directories.

src.config.config.PROJ_ROOT = PosixPath('/home/w3rkman/backup.varnsen/projects/nfl-analysis')

pathlib.Path: Root directory of the project.

src.config.config.RAW_DATA_URLS = {'games': 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nflverse/nfldata/master/data/games.csv', 'plays': 'https://github.com/nflverse/nflverse-data/releases/download/pbp'}

dict: URLs to raw data files.

src.config.config.RUSHING_AGGS = {'fumble': 'mean', 'rush': 'sum', 'week': ['max'], 'yards_gained': 'mean'}

dict: Functions for aggregating rushing features from play-by-play data.

src.config.config.SCORING_METRIC = 'neg_brier_score'

str: Scoring metric for hyperparameter tuning.

src.config.config.TRAINING = {'games_cols': ['game_id', 'season', 'week', 'away_rest', 'home_rest', 'div_game', 'roof', 'surface', 'away_team', 'home_team'], 'holdout_year': 2020}

dict: Parameters for training data.
